1422940.name: Glider Sim Deluxe – Soaring Simulator
1422940.description:
SOAR THROUGH REALISTIC SKIES:   

Experience the thrill of free flight in VR with authentic physics, stunning scenery, and endless exploration.

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO EARTH ONLINE:  

Explore the Entire Planet with Google Earth integration (subscription no longer required!) Discover photorealistic landscapes, save favorite locations, and share them with friends in multiplayer.

MASTER 8 UNIQUE AIRCRAFT

  • Paraglider

  • Paramotor

  • Hang Glider

  • Mini-Wing

  • Speedwing

  • Ultralight Trike

  • FPV Racing Drone

  • Spectator Cam.

The FPV Racing Drone has 3 flight modes including: Auto Hover, Angle and Acro.

3 CUSOTM OFFLINE MAPS

  • Sun Valley, USA

  • Walenstadt, Switzerland (Swiss Alps)

  • Grand Teton, USA

Each custom map spans 50+ square kilometers of enhanced real-world terrain with high-resolution textures and hundreds of launch points. Playable offline with no internet connection. 

DYNAMIC WEATHER & THERMALS: 

Control wind speed, direction, cloud base, and time of day. Sun angle and terrain generate realistic thermal activity. Toggle wind particles to visualize thermals and ridge lift.

AUTHENTIC FLIGHT PHYSICS: 

Advanced soft-body simulation models every cell of the canopy for realistic wingovers, spirals, stalls, and swoops. Real-world aerodynamic calculations combined with dynamic physics create an unmatched flying experience.

COMPETE & CONNECT:  

Master Speed Flying challenges and Cross Country races. Climb monthly leaderboards, fly with friends in multiplayer, or join the Discord community to organize group flights.

Your next flight awaits.
